metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5493 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: wp-includes/ms-functions.php in the Multisite WordPress API in WordPress before 4.7.1 does not properly choose random numbers for keys, which makes it easier for remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions via a crafted (1) site signup or (2) user signup.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
